result.execSummary:
The defendant Ethan Curtis Wykle was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Methamphetamine, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Imposed/stayed 3 1/2 years WI State Prison. 18 months IC/2 years ES. Eligible for programs.

miscConds.notes: AODA assessment and follow through w/ recommended treatment
Obtain/maintain full time employment and/or school. If not employed, must submit 3 job applications a week to DOC agent.

No contact w/ Richard Baldwin and/or Mr. Diedrich. 
Take all medication as prescribed by a Dr and approved by agent. 
Comply w/ any assessments/counseling/treatment deemed necessary by agent.

Absolute sobriety.
No possession/consumption of alcohol, controlled substance w/out a valid Rx, and/or drug paraphernalia.
Psychological evaluation and follow through w/ recommended treatment/counseling.

Court costs of $288 and DNA surcharge of $250 payable to the COC office at the rate of $50/month commencing 8/1/2022. $250 cash bond will be applied. Submit DNA sample. Default of payment debt referred to SDC. Supervision fees payable to DOC during probation.
Court grants expungement upon defendant successfully completing sentence.

timeConds.notes: 120 days conditional jail. Forthwith. 106 days credit. If defendant is employed, Court may consider commuting some jail time upon proof of employment. Defendant to notify the Court of where he will be residing upon his release.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ethan Curtis Wykle

records.descr: Order Collection Biological Specimen DNA Analysis

records.addlTxt:
3:10 PM Prosecuting attorney John Luetscher in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Ethan Curtis Wykle in court, in custody.  Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Ethan Curtis Wykle. Victim rights. State does not have any corrections or additions to factual content of the PSI. Atty Hansen states defendant's additions/corrections to the factual content of the PSI on the record. State has a copy of Exhibit #1 and is aware of the plea negotiations. State's recommendations. Atty Hansen heard on recommendations. State makes stmt re expungement - defendant is eligible. Court makes stmt. Court sentence; Imposed/stayed 3 1/2 years WI State Prison (18 months IC/2 years ES), placed on DOC probation for a period of 2 years - eligible for programs. Conditions of probation; 120 days conditional jail (106 days credit), AODA assessment, comply w/ any assessments/counseling/treatment deemed necessary by agent, no contact w/ Richard Baldwin and Mr. Diedrich, absolute sobriety - no possession/consumption of alcohol, controlled substance w/out valid Rx and or drug paraphernalia, psychological evaluation and follow through, obtain/maintain full time employment and/or school, if not employed submit three job applications a week to DOC agent, take all medication as prescribed by a Dr and approved by agent, court costs of $288 and $250 DNA surcharge payable to the COC office at the rate of $50/month commencing 9/1/2022 until paid in full, submit DNA sample. Default of payment debt referred to SDC. Supervision fees payable to DOC during probation. Expungement granted if defendant successfully completes sentence. Defendant to notify court of where he will reside upon release. If defendant is employed and provides proof to the Court, the Court will consider commuting jail time.
Expungement Review scheduled for August 1, 2024 at 07:00 am.

records.descr: Notice and acknowledge of def voting ineligibility

records.addlTxt: State's Exhibit #1 - plea negotiations

1:10 PM Defendant Ethan Curtis Wykle in court, in custody.  Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Ethan Curtis Wykle. Attorney Edward Daniel Burke Jr. in court for State of Wisconsin. Court makes stmt. State's Exhibit #1 - plea negotiations marked/received/reviewed by the Court. Defendant waives reading of charge and enters a plea of NO CONTEST to count 1 of 22CF36. PLQ received/reviewed by the Court w/ the defendant. 22CF86 dismissed/read-in. Court finds the defendant's plea to be made freely and voluntarily. Factual basis found. Adjudged guilty. Court orders PSI. Present bond cont'd. NOH given to court security to give to defendant in custody of OC Jail. 
Sentencing hearing scheduled for August 1, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
Plea hearing on June 10, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

2:57 PM Defendant Ethan Curtis Wykle in court.   Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Ethan Curtis Wykle. Attorney Edward Daniel Burke Jr. in court for State of Wisconsin. Court orders defendant to appear at next hrg. NOH given to defendant in jail.
Status conference on May 25, 2022 at 02:45 pm.
2:03 PM Defendant Ethan Curtis Wykle in court, in custody.  Attorney Edward Daniel Burke Jr. in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Ethan Curtis Wykle.

10:32 AM Defendant Ethan Curtis Wykle in court with attorney Brad Hansen.  Edward Daniel Burke appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Information received. Defendant waives any further reading and enters a plea of NOT GUILTY. Present bond cont'd.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 19, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

01:40 PM Defendant Ethan Curtis Wykle in court, in custody, with attorney Brad Hansen.  Edward Daniel Burke appeared for the State of Wisconsin. PQW received/reviewed by the Court w/ the defendant and Atty Hansen. Court finds the defendant's waiver to be made freely and voluntarily and accepts the waiver. The Court further finds probable cause a felony has been committed by this defendant and is bound over to the circuit court. Present bond cont'd.  Arraignment scheduled for April 4, 2022 at 10:30 am.
no possession/consumption of alcohol, controlled substance w/out a valid prescription and/or drug paraphernalia. No contact w/ Richard Baldwin. Report to OCSD for booking/fingerprinting.

11:46 AM Defendant Ethan Curtis Wykle in court with attorney Brad Hansen.  Edward Daniel Burke appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court makes stmt. DA Burke makes stmt. Atty Hansen heard on his bond motion. Court makes stmt. Court reduces cash bond to $250 w/ all the same conditions. Defendant request PH within time limits.

11:45 AM Defendant Ethan Curtis Wykle in court with attorney Brad Hansen.  Edward Daniel Burke appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant waives an further reading of charge and understands the possible penalities if convicted. Court proceeds w/ bond hearing.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 22, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Notice of Motion and Motion for Reduction of Bail
Adjourned initial appearance on March 14, 2022 at 11:45 am.
Bail/bond hearing on March 14, 2022 at 11:45 am.
Phone call to Debbie/DA's office and Atty Hansen in office, rescheduled the CIA that was set on 3/17/2022 at 2pm to CIA and BBH on 3/14/2022 at 11:45am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: w/condition  Defendant shall not possess/consume alcoholic beverages.  Defendant shall not possess/consume any illegal drugs, drug paraphernalia/controlled substances without a valid prescription.  Defendant shall not have direct or indirect contact w/ Richard Baldwin. Defendant shall immediately report to the Sheriff's Department for fingerprinting and photographing.

01:44 PM Defendant Ethan Curtis Wykle in court, in custody.  Edward Daniel Burke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Def given complaint, advised of charges, and advised of right to counsel/spd.  Bond is set.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 17, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
